inn1.comm: wide down the leg side from over the stumps. Zaheer gets the ball to swing, but it landed outside leg to start with.
on the pads again, at 132 kph, and Mahela clips it behind square. India have protection in the deep.
pitched up on off stump, and Dilshan punches it back past Zaheer's attempt to lunge and stop. Mid-on comes in the way.
full again, at 132 kph, Dilshan is again on the front foot and drives into the covers.
swing and a miss outside off as Zaheer wafts it on a full length wide of off stump.
compact from Dilly, leans out and defends into the off side.
a couple of runs to end the over. Back of a length on the hips and Dilshan tries to nudge it away. The ball doesn't go into the outfield quick enough for the fielder to come in and deny the second.
gets the big inswing going straight away. It kept curling in out of his fingers and got Mahela's inside edge onto the body. The ball rolled near the stumps and Mahela deflects it atway with bat.
fuller length, Mahela leans out and defends it down the track.
another one nips in at 129 kph, Mahela tucks it to the leg side for a quick single.
short of driving length, Dilshan stays back and carves into cover as the ball nips in. Mistimed.
good bowling. He's looking for the bat-pad gap, with a big inswinger. Dilshan plays with a good enough forward press and works it to midwicket.
inside edge? Aborted lbw appeal from PK as he gets one to hold its line from a length around off stump. Dilshan was forward and stuck close to the knee roll.
top delivery from Zaheer. He gets this angle across Mahela at decent pace and it skims past the outside edge.

Mahela at his best. Makes Zaheer armed with a new ball look like a spinner. He starts from a foot outside the crease, and shimmies down the track to get under a length ball and slap it almost kindly over mid-on for four.
fuller length wide of off stump, Mahela leans out and defends.
holds the length back as the ball angles across. Mahela defends to the off side.
flowing drive into the covers as Zaheer pitches it up, but Raina is in the way.
Mahela stays in the crease as he leans across to defend a length ball to the leg side.
PK is searching for swing, keeps it on a good length outside off and Dilshan punches into the covers.
back of a length outside off, Dilshan stays in the crease and shoulders arms.
short and wide, the ball isn't coming on at pace here. Dilshan tries to carve through point and misses.
back of a length, Dilshan stays behind the line and defends.

crashed past point. Just past point. Pretty poor ball that at PK's pace. Short and wide of off stump, and Dilshan flays it happily. Kohli dived away to his right, but the ball flew past. It had already bounced when it passed him.
on the pads to end the over, Dilshan tucks it square for a single.
short ball from Zak, no real pace on it. Dilshan slaps it across to the deep for a single.
pitched up wide of off stump, Mahela plays a scoop drive in the air, but the ball lands well short of point.
short of a length outside off, the ball darts away off the seam and Mahela leaves.
full length on the pads, Mahela works it to the leg side.

Mahela is taking him on! Another stunning stroke, this time he doesn't loft it with love, he launches it with a flourish. Skips out once again, the ball is fuller than in the last over and Mahela just swings it off the middle of the bat over long-on.
stays in the crease now, the surprise sortie done and dusted, and defends to the off side.
Dilshan covers the line from the crease and pushes a single to mid-on.
length ball from PK, he hasn't swung too many in the last couple of overs. Defended by Mahela.
he charges out to PK, who sees him coming and holds the length back and cramps him for room. Mahela's drag finds midwicket.
a single pinched to Kohli. Mahela stays back and drops the ball to point. Dilshan flies across and beats Kohli's under-arm throw which in any case missed the stumps.

appeal for lbw, but the height may have saved Dilshan. PK got this ball to nip in off the seam, and Dilshan was caught on the crease. He was hit over the knee roll, but the Hawk Eye reading should make for interesting viewing. Here it is, it agrees with Taufel. Going over the stumps.
keeps it back of a length again, Dilshan pushes it into the covers.
length ball on off stump, angling across, and defended compactly off the front foot.
over-pitched wide of off stump, and Dilshan misses the boundary chance. He drives it cleanly but straight to mid-off.
slower ball at 120 kph, looped up on the toes and clipped through midwicket.
drops this short, doesn't give Mahela any room as he stays back and looks to glide it square. Plays it straight to point.
slow offcutter at 118 kph, Mahela works it off his pads behind square for a single.
back of a length again to end the over, Dilshan works to midwicket for one. Expect a lot of slower balls today.

Third umpire called for after a direct hit, but Dilshan seems to have made his ground. Only just. Raina was the man swooping in from mid-on and he under-armed it onto the stumps, but Dilshan was in without even having to dive.
Mahela again tries to make his own pace, PK smartly follows Mahela and bowls it short of a length at the pads. Mahela has no room for leverage and can't play a proper shot.
can't play the ball any softer. Mahela literally tames the ball and makes it stop obediently on the off side. Dilshan is already half way there. Easily done

an appeal for a catch behind! Or is it an appeal for lbw? Dhoni smiles after it is turned down and signals the latteer. Dilshan moves across and attempts the ramp shot over the leg side. The replay shows it hit the elbow guard. Was it in front of the stumps? Surely too high..
on Dilshan's pads, he works it softly to midwicket and they pinch a second off Ravindra Jadeja who runs in from the deep. This is exemplary running.
back of a length on the pads, Dilshan can't get the work to leg away this time. This is an impressive start from SL on a sluggish wicket.
full ball on the stumps, Zaheer is not bowling much outside off any more. Mahela works it wide of mid-on for one.
knuckled slower ball from Zaheer, holds the length back and Dilshan punches into the covers for a single.
another slower ball that loops in as Mahela skips out and plays across the line. Hit on the pad, but Taufel needs to be a computer to predict if that would have hit the stumps.
Zak slips this one across Mahela down the leg side and it is a wide.
another slower ball, and he's holding the length back. Mahela edges it onto the pad, and to the off side.

another slower ball, this time full on the pads at 117 kph and Dilshan gets it away through square leg to Kohli in the deep. Kohli and Jadeja fielding on the ropes in the leg side. India rotating their close-in fielders now?
slower ball from over the stumps, well wide of leg stump, but Dilshan gets the bat across to play it square for one. Surely a wide if he'd let that go.
at PK's pace, he really can't get away with too many half-trackers. Especially when Dilshan is batting. He was into the pull so early that the ball flew in between midwicket and mid-on for four.
short again, this time outside off, and Dilshan slaps it straight to point.
better line this time, and closer to a decent length too. Dilshan defends it back down the track.
back of a length, just outside off and Dilshan's cut finds point again.

Kohli dives at point, but can't stop it cleanly. If he had, this could have been a run out chance at the bowler's end, since Dilshan wasn't running straight away. He stopped purely on Kohli's reputation there...
wide outside off, Mahela opens the face and steers it, but straight to the man behind square on the off side.
full length outside off stump, Dilshan drives hard through mid-off.
holds the length back, nice and pacy delivery defended from the crease.
back of a length outside off, dropped to the off side for a single.
angled into the pads at 145 kph, Dilshan whips to midwicket for a single.
gets the couple this time to the leg side.

third man comes into play, the gangling Ashwin had some room to cover and dived to his left. Mahela had little room outside off, but still opened the face to steer. He got it just over Gambhir at gully.
back of a length outside off, Dilshan pushes to cover.
stays in the crease and opens the face to defend to work it to the off side.
tossed up, he skips out and drives it back to the bowler.
varies his length all the time does Jadeja, this time Dilshan oes back and pushes a single to mid-on.
fuller and slower, Mahela leans out to defend.

Mahela's gifted his wicket. Trying to be too cheeky. Did he not know that there was a man at slip? He leans back and looks to play the late cut and steers it straight at Sehwag's face. Sehwag puts his hands up, parries it up and holds well. Did he whisper, "Did you see my catch?" as he trotted in with his captain to celebrate with Jadeja? Wicket against the run of play.
back of a length outside off, Dilshan hacks it into the off side. Point and cover have it covered.
148 kph on a sharp indipper that beats Dilshan for pace. He misses the flick and is hit on the pad, but it was going down the leg side.
fuller length, Dilshan is again late on the shot and misses the flick.
short ball, Dilshan cracks it square for a single.
full length ball outside off, Sanga defends to the off side.
back of a length, nice robust start to Yadav's spell today. Sanga stays in the crease and defends.
short of a length on the stumps, Dilshan stays back and pushes a single through mid-on.
strays down the leg side and allows Sanga an easy single to open his account.
flighted wide of off stump, Dilshan drags it across the line for one more to midwicket.
pitched up on the stumps, Sanga works it to mid-on.
back of a length and straightening down the line. Sanga nudges it square for a single.
tossed up on the pads. Five easy singles in Ashwin's first over. Dilshan turns it off the pads.
short ball, murdered. The corpse of the ball can be found at the square leg boundary. Dilshan was set up for the pull as soon as Yadav dropped short, and he wallops it with a vengeance.
143 kph, beats Dilshan for pace with a fuller length once again.
145 kph, Dilshan stays back and tries to turn it square, but gets a leading edge. The ball goes in the air for a bit but bounces before it reaches the outfield at square leg.
short ball to Sanga now, who guides the pull behind square for a couple more.
full ball wide of off stump, Sanga jams it to the off side for a single.
yet again, Dilshan misses a quick ball slipping down the leg side. Umesh should consider getting one of these on the money.
back of a length outside off, Sanga punches a single into the covers.
holds the length back outside off, Dilshan stays back and defends.
fuller length, Dilshan leans out and defends to the off side.
straighter on the pads, worked to the leg side.
tossed up on the stumps, Sanga defends off the front foot.
tossed up outside off stump, Sanga drives through mid-off for another single.
Yadav goes full and wide of off stump, Sanga drives through the off side.
width outside off to Sanga, the field is back on the off side. Sanga's pleasing cover drive finds the fielder in the deep.
he's ramping the pace up. 149 kph, Dilshan defends from the crease to the off side.
on Dilshan's pads, he works it square for a single.
we've seen some beautiful pull shots today, but none as good as this from Sanga. 145 kph and dropped short, Sanga leans back and whirls it away smoothly through square leg.
goes very full now wide of off stump, and Sanga digs it out to point.
back of a length on the pads, Dilshan tucks it square for a single.
short of a length, Sanga plays back and shows it into the covers.
tossed up well outside leg, a couple of easy runs for Sanga who works it square.
back of a length again, pushed to the covers once again.
Dilshan works it off the pads to the leg side for a single.
angled into the pads, worked to the leg side for a single.
short of a length outside off stump, Sanga leans back and steers as it spins in, straight ti point.
short of a length, Sanga stays back and pushes it through mid-on.
Dilshan is caught on the crease by a smart delivery, but manages to get a single away.
Sanga flourishes through the covers, a couple of runs added to the tally as he drives against the turn.
short of a length and turning in, Ashwin chops into the off side for a single.
tossed up on the stumps, driven back to the bowler.
Sanga leans out and drives down the ground for a single.
Dilshan pushes a length ball into the cover. Easy single on offer once again.
tossed up on the stumps, Sanga leans out and defends.
back of a length outisde off, Sanga drives down the ground for one more.
one quick single too many? Dilshan defends to point, Sanga wants a single and is turned back. He has to dive in to beat the throw from point.
tossed up, Dilshan screams out and bangs it wide of mid-on for four. He's batting quite smartly here.
on the pads now, Dilshan works it square for another single.
hopelessly short. Dhoni moans, "Naaa" on the stump mic the moment Sanga latched on with a back foot punch into the covers.
short again, but no room for Sanga, who pushes with the turn through mid-on for a single.
flighted on middle and leg, Dilshan drives back down the track.
tossed up on the stumps, defended off the front foot back to the bowler.
full again on the stumps, Sanga plays it down the track.
straightens from outside off stump, defended to the off side off the front foot.
back of a length outside off, Sanga works it behind square for a single. Manoj Tiwary fumbles in the deep, but the second run isn't available.
Dilshan has 50, and if he makes it a 100, this could be curtains for India. Lovely little stroke, he goes back dabs an offbreak coming in neatly through third man.
tossed up this time, no room for Dilshan who defends off the front foot.
straightening from off stump line, Sanga pushes through mid-on for one.
on the pads, too many easy runs on offer. Dilshan helps it along behind square for one.
short ball outside off, Sanga punches through the covers for one more.
tossed up as Dilshan skips out, and he drives straight to cover.
flighted outside off, Dilshan drives it to the left of Jadeja who dives and parries into the covers.
poor finish to the over for Sri Lanka, Dilshan opens the face to a tight length ball on off stump and plays it to point.
Sanga stays back to a full length ball and drives it between Ashwin's dive and mid-off for one.
flat ball outside off, Dilshan goes back and works it square for one.
tossed up, a touch of drift into the pads, Sanga leans out to defend.
shorter, Sanga stays in the crease and works a single to the leg side.
drift again from round the stump, Dilshan covers the line late and defends.
too short, Dilshan carves to deep cover for a single to end the over.
Jadeja slips one down the leg side, but Dilshan gets something on it. Dhoni is in the way.
back of a length outside off, forced into the off side.
Dilshan skips out of the crease, but Jadeja holds the length back and Dilshan gets into an awry position to do anything with it.
belatedly gets the single by pushing through extra cover.
tossed up outside Sanga's off stump, defended off the front foot.
straightens from the off and middle line, Sanga works it to the leg side.
Dilshan skips out to the pitch of the ball and defends down the track.

there's one poor ball at least, almost every over. Short ball outside off, Dilshan forces it off the outside edge and it goes through third man. Zaheer is clearly not match-fit, but he's playing today since India don't have enough bowlers. He somehow manages to chase and field.
full ball on the stumps, Sanga leans out and plays it down the track.
tossed up outside off, Sanga drives into the covers for a single.
back of a length, Dilshan waits and guides it behind square to Zaheer at short third man for a single.
back of a length outside off, Dilshan drives through extra cover for one.
flighted outside off, Sanga pushes a single to mid-off. Scratch that. They see it is Zaheer running in, and decide there's a second to be had.
Sanga skips out and plays with the turn towards mid-on.
Sanga stays back and pushes to mid-off as Jadeja spins one in.

another short ball outside off, with no third man in place. Listless bowling just got more listless. Dilshan carves it away through backward point and Tendulkar runs back all the way from short third man. No lunch.
tossed up outside leg, Dilshan sweeps it behind square for a single.
back of a length from round the stumps, Sanga drives through mid-on for one.
length ball on the stumps, Dilshan hangs back and punches to mid-off.
Dilshan moves the front foot across and works a length ball to the leg side.
Sanga leans out and defends to the leg side.
Sanga skips out to the flight and gets the ball down to mid-on for one.
slow and loopy on the stumps, Dilshan defends off the front foot.
back of a length on the stumps, worked to the leg side.
back of a length outside off stump, Sanga pokes it away behind point for one.
Dilshan goes for a big heave to the leg side as the ball spins in from outside leg. He doesn't get bat on it.
short ball outside off, Dilshan pushes a single into the off side.
flighted outside off stump, Sanga's drive is intercepted by Raina's dive at cover.
Sanga jumps out, can't get to the flight and slaps it through the midwicket area for a single.
tossed up on the stumps, Sanga drives past mid-off for a single.
full again, Dilshan advances and plays it back to the bowler.
flatter length, Dilshan walks across the stumps and dinks a single to square leg.
flighted generously outside off, Sanga quietly takes a single through mid-off. He doesn't look like a batsman out of form.
tossed up on the stumps, Dilshan shimmies out and drives through the leg side for one.
Praveen has messed it up at long on. He's completely misjudged a catch. Sanga tried to dump him over long-on, but he couldn't get under it. Praveen raced in too far, and the ball flew over his head.
Dilshan works a single to the leg side for one.
Sanga drives through mid-on for one.
Dilshan tries to nudge square, but there's no run to be had.
leans out and looks to drive, but defends down the track.
tries to sweep, but he can't get the ball away.
India are flying through the overs. No Dhoni, you don't get the bonus point for bowling your overs in quick time! Dilshan plays a length ball down the track.
Sanga has made a high-class fifty without breaking into a sweat. Tossed up outside off, Sanga skips out and bangs him straight down the ground for four.
Sanga does it again, he jumps out and looks to drive but doesn't get hold of it this time. Drags a single to long-on.
Dilshan works a single to the leg side and hands the strike to Sanga, who is suddenly the chosen aggressor.
Sanga pushes a single down the ground now.

yet again, a short and wide ball outside off stump from a spinner. Dilshan happily opens the blade and dabs it through the vacant area behind point. I say vacant, but if you want to get technical, Zaheer Khan was at short third man.
full ball on leg stump, Dilshan sweeps straight to backward square leg.
Sanga skips out to a length ball first up, and works a single through square leg.
outside leg to Dilshan now, not much pace on the ball for him to generate the pace. The ball dawdles away towards fine leg, and PK comes in the way.

a foot and a half outside leg. A wide for the taking, but Dilshan wants the boundary instead. Whipped authoritatively for four to fine leg's right. Zak wasn't ready for this early Powerplay spell, he didn't warm up before bowling. And it shows.
pitched up outside off, Dilshan drives through mid-off for one.
yorker to Sanga, it curls in through the air, and he pushes a single into the mid-off area.
another very full ball, Dilshan plays all over it, and they get a single to the off side as it goes from bat onto foot before dribbling away.
tossed up on the stumps, worked through square leg for one.
here comes the boundary ball, short and wide outside off stump and Sanga hammers it through the covers. A half stop from Kohli in the covers saves the fourth before Jadeja runs back to clean up.
on the leg stump line, Dilshan plays to the leg side with a straight ball.
pushes off the pads through wide mid-on for a single ... They think of a second, but the throw is fired in this time.
Sanga screams out of the crease to open up the off side, but can't time the lofted off drive too well. A couple of bounces on the way to long-on.
short of a length on the stumps, Dilshan pushes a single to long-on. 17 off the first two Powerplay overs.
fast and straight on the pads, Dilshan can't get bat on the flick to the leg side, but gets the leg bye away.
Sanga is out of his crease again, a full length ball wide of off stump squeezed into the covers for one.
yet again, Umesh beats Dilshan's bat with a straight pacy ball that is inside edged onto the pad and to the off side.
third man is fine, and wisely. Sanga opens the face and dabs a wide ball outside off rapidly to third man.
back of a length outside off at 142 kph, Dilshan cuts straight to point.
that swings in, Dilshan throws his bat at it in hope and inner edges to the leg side for one.
short from Ashwin, Dilshan goes back and works it through mid-on for a single.
back of a length, Sanga stays back and forces a single through mid-off.
Dilshan can't get a short of length ball on the pads away to the leg side.
tossed up on the stumps, Dilshan leans out and defends.
flighted on the stumps, Dilshan whips it past midwicket for a single.
hideously short ball. Sanga could have hit this anywhere over the leg side, but he chose long on since it was vacant, and carted it past the ropes.
back of a length from Yadav, forced to the off side without much timing.
good length ball, Sanga muscles it over the covers for two more.

Sanga glorious! Makes complete use of Yadav's pace. Full ball angling into the pads, Sanga stomps all over it. Walks across the stumps and whips it all the way over square leg. Yadav says, "Bang bang, he shot me down!" The ball takes a beating.
low full toss outside off, it swings across and goes off the bottom edge through fine leg.
Dilshan steals a single to the off side, he steers a length ball to point and Sanga responds quickly.
Sanga opens the face and steers to the off side.
another short ball from Ashwin. Sanga rocks back and hammers him through square leg for four more.
tossed up decisively now, Sanga drives in the air to long-on, and this time PK stays back and fields.
short again, Dilshan hammers a single to midwicket.
fuller ball on the stumps, Sanga drives down the ground for one more.
back of a length to Dilshan, worked off the pads to midwicket.
sweeps one from outside leg to Yadav at fine leg. The 150 stand is up. Ashwin's spell is over.
horrible start, well down the leg side and it is a wide. Dhoni doesn't stop cleanly either.
back of a length outside off, Sanga tries to crack it square but finds point.
Sanga skips out and tries to carve through the off side, but he's beaten by the slower ball.
Sanga skipped out and whipped off the pads through midwicket where young gun Rohit Sharma misfields in the deep. Doesn't bend low enough, and goes with one hand. Misfield concedes an extra run.
Sanga skips out and drives down the ground for a single.
wide down the leg side to Dilshan, PK has lost it too.
outside leg stump yet again, Dilshan helps it along to fine leg where Gambhir fields it after running across.
yorker from Yadav, Dilshan punches it past short cover for a single.
Sanga completely mistimes a lofted drive, but it drops well short of Tendulkar as he runs in from long-off.
short ball to Dilshan, he slaps it behind square for a couple more.
130 kph, and the ball cuts in from outside off. Dilshan defends off the front foot and inner edges to the leg side...
another slower ball, 117 kph and Dilshan defends to cover. He's one short of a 100.

Taufel takes for ever to signal the legbye after refusing the lbw shout! That was close. Dilshan was trapped on the crease by a pacy indipper, but was he in front? Legbye taken to the off side. Dilshan has strike. It went over the stumps says HawkEye.
tossed up on the stumps, Dilshan works it down the track.
a most un-Dilshan like century to Dilshan, and only the second of the series by anyone. He pushes a full ball through mid-on and gets the single away. That's his first in this country.
full ball outside off, Sanga drags it away through mid-on for one to Kohli. They want two, but Kohli's return is sharp.
Dilshan lunges out and looks to drive inside out into the covers.
this is slog season. Three men back on the leg side, but Sanga had to find one of the many gaps between them once Jadeja tossed it up on leg stump. He went over square leg this time.

just for fun, Sanga goes straighter this time and easily eludes long-on. Tossed up on the stumps, it spins into his slot and allows Sanga a happy swing. The wheels came off a while back, now they are being sold for their scrap value.
and now the buyer is refusing to take the wheels even at throwaway prices. PK slips down the leg side now and Dilshan heaves it along past fine leg for four.
back of a length outside off, Dilshan forces through the off side for a couple more.
tossed up on the stumps, driven down the ground for a single.
slower ball from round the stumps, Sanga works it behind square for a single.
over-pitched on the stumps, Dilshan bunts to long-on for a single.
PK attempts a yorker at long last, and Sanga inside-edges it past the stumps for a single.
a low swinging yorker, Sanga manages to advance and take it on the full. Single to midwicket.
Dilshan takes one in the soft spot, trying to swing Xaheer's length ball to the leg side. Did he edge that? Else he's taken the full impact. Ouch.
over-pitched outside off, Dilshan stays back and pushes a single to mid-off for one.

Sanga tries hard to get out on 98, and then on 99, but manages to get to 100! He was trying to work Zak to the leg side from outside off, but got a leading edge that took off, but landed safely away from point and third man. And then he had to run in and dive for the second.. A direct hit could have stopped him short. A glorious exhibition of batting this.
Sanga punches through the off side for one more.
Zaheer drifts onto the pads for the umpteenth time. He's done it more times today than he did through out the tour. Dilshan happily heaves it along to fine leg for four.
length ball in Sanga's pads now, bashed through midwicket for four more. Sanga is trying to make this as classy as possible, but this is violent all the same.

India surprise themselves with a wicket. PK slips a slow yorker past Sanga's swipe to leg and it disturbs on the stumps. Sanga's found top form ahead of Sri Lanka's last league game, and most likely, the finals.
back of a length outside off, Thisara carves it behind square for a single.
direct hit from mid-off, but Dilshan's made it. He played the shot too hard, and had to hustle, but got in, in time.
pitched up on off stump, Thisara guides it through the covers for a single.
low full toss on the middle stump, Dilshan wants strike. He drives down to long-on for one.

this is why Dilshan wanted strike. He's taken on the short leg side boundary and cleared it easily. Zaheer angles it across at a friendly pace, Dilshan leans across and muscled this high over the ropes.
and a couple more now, over-pitched on the stumps and drilled down the ground.
back of a length, Dilshan swipes to the leg side for two more.
gets a yorker in place outside off, and it is jammed to the off side for a single.
back of a length outside off, Thisara drops it to the off side for a single.
Zaheer angles in from wide of the crease, on the pads and whipped square for another single.
PK is bowling at the tenth stumps. Another wide down the leg side.
a low full toss at 130 kph when you are in the 120s. What more can you ask for? Dilshan walks away from his stumps to create room and thumps it through extra cover for four.
goes full and straight now as Dilshan backs away and he works a couple more through midwicket.
PK is swinging the ball so much that even has no clue now what it is doing. Several wides wide of off stump now.

a third wicket now, once again gifted. Thisara was trying to get a second run that was virtually impossible. Dilshan played it down the ground, and the throw came in from long-on. PK had the time to collect and break the stumps. Thisara was just outside the crease as he dived in full length.
back of a length outside off, Mathews nearly gone without facing a ball as Dilshan chops to point and takes off. Jadeja misses the stumps this time.

just when you thought India were yet to concede an overthrow in this deluge of mediocrity, they do. Back of a length outside off, Mathews pushes to point for a single. A needless throw from the fielder misses the stumps and they pinch a second.
The Berlin wall was still up when PK began this over. It has ended now. Mathews tucks off the pads behind square for a single.
full, fast and tailing in. Whipped with the angle through square leg for one.

this reminds me of Ponting murdering India's fast bowlers in the 2003 World Cup final now. Dilshan has missed many of Yadav's fast and straight balls today, but not this one. He stayed deep in the crease and bludgeoned this into the grass banks beyond midwicket.
back of a length outside off, Dilshan heaves a single into the covers.
Mathews inner edges a ball that nips in from outside off, but it eludes the stumps.
Dilshan again stays deep and tries to hammer a length ball to the leg side, but he can't get under it this time.

Mathews plays a stunning stroke for his first four. He spots Yadav's inswing early, stays put in the crease and drives it against the deviation through the covers. You could see smoke coming out of the ball as it disappeared through the covers.
Dilshan tries a reverse sweep now, short ball he gets a leading edge that loops up behind Dhoni, but short third man can't get there.
back of a length, Mathews punches through mid-on for a single.
the 300 comes up. Dilshan heaves through the leg side
Mathews stays back to some flat stuff and punches through the mid off area for a couple.
Mathews tries to slog to the leg side, but can't make solid connection. Single taken.
Dilshan presses forward and drives through mid-on for one.
over-pitched and swinging in, Dilshan has a single every time he works it to the leg side, but he wants two. And gets it quite easily.

Dilshan has 150 now. And he took a long time to step up into gear. Over-pitched on the pads again, it tailed in late, but Dilshan worked it with the angle through square leg for one. And to think Dilshan nearly missed this game with a hand injury.
back of a length to Mathews, who works it to midwicket for one.
slower ball, heaved to the leg side without timing for a single.

Mathews is gone? He tries to lash to the leg side from wide of off stump, but he gets a top edge. The ball loops up to long off, where Ashwin runs in and tumbles ahead to take a fine catch. That's India's first bright moment all day.
Dilshan tries the swing to leg again, and doesn't time the low full toss. Single to leg side. Is that Zaheer Khan's last ball on Australian soil...?
short ball outside off, came through too slowly for Dilshan to time the pull. Single to the deep.
speared in wide of off stump, Chandimal carves it past Dhoni to short third man for a single.
Raina bowls some smart stuff here, Dilshan can't get under his quick back of length balls and mistimes the slog to deep midwicket. It lands short.
Chandimal moves across the stumps and works a ball to the leg side for a single.
Dilshan equals his highest score in ODIs. The last time, Sri Lanka got 411 and lost the game. He gets nicely under the length this time and bulldozes it over midwicket for six.
a dot ball to end the carnage. Short and fast, it slips under Dilshan's attempted heave to the leg side.

inn2.comm: short of a length, on the stumps, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
length ball on the pads, flicked to fine leg for one
straying onto the pads again, picked away for another single
short of a length, outside off, Tharanga makes a diving save at short cover-point
punched away nicely, but straight to mid-off
short of a ;length, on the pads, nicely flicked to the left of fine leg for two
heave-ho to a short-of-a-length delivery, the ball cuts in and beats him
length ball, around off, Sehwag gets under it nicely and lofts it over mid-off. Clean strike
short of a length, on the stumps, pushed wide of short midwicket for a single
nice flick from outside off, but can't beat midwicket
short of a length outside off, pushed with an open face to cover-point
Nearly a chance. Short of a length, outside off, past the diving MJ at short cover-point. Would have been a screamer had he pulled it off
picked away off the hips for a single to long leg
short and wide, Tendulkar rocks back and cuts it to the right of third man for a couple
shortish and wide again, but this time the cut goes straight to third man
slower ball, flicked uppishly, nearly carries to square leg at the edge of the circle
short ball, Sehwag is back in the crease, and pulls him flat over midwicket, one bounce into the fence
yorker outside off, dug out towards mid-off
Tendulkar premeditates a paddle, Kula bowls a slower one, he adjusts well and scoops it for couple fine of fine leg
short and wide, Tendulkar cuts it mercilessly to the right of backward point
slower ball outside off, guides it behind square for a single
length ball on off, punched on the up, can't beat cover-point
full ball on off, smacked away with an open face past point. Too full at this pace. No swing either
Sehwag steps away to make room, then comes back into the original stance, drives it back on the up, and Kula sticks his foot out to save any runs
yorker outside off, Tendulkar squeezes it out to point.
full and wide of off stump. Very wide and not called. Can the umpire see the ball?

smashed. Tendulkar is off to a rousing start here, uninhibited strokeplay is the way to go. Over-pitched wide of off stump, Tendulkar was hanging back in the crease to get under it, he didn't have to. This was in the slot and he blasted it through the covers.
full-pitched again, wider outside off. Tendulkar moves across and opens the face to steer ot behind point for one.

short ball, and Sehwag carts it over midwicket. The slowness of this pitch gave him enough time to get under it and bang it high over the infield. Interesting to note that he didn't go with the upper cut this time. Maharoof made a good effort after moving across from deep square leg, but couldn't stop it clean.

at last, some spunk from India. Another short ball outside off stump, Sehwag swivels back and swats it, this time off the middle of the bat and into the grassbanks beyond midwicket. He gave that the good old Dilshan.
pitched well up outside off stump, Tendulkar defends into the covers.
over-pitched again, Tendulkar drives hard into the covers but there are too many men there for him to find a gap.
in the air, but safe. Tendulkar can't time the lofted off drive to a good length ball but manages to get it over Kula and through for two. India have 50 in no time.
Kula is sticking to that tight line outside off, Tendulkar is still unable to pierce the field in the covers.

close, but Tendulkar escapes. Slower ball from Kula, Tendulkar steers to cover and sets off, but it went straight to Mahela. Direct hit and Sachin would have been out as he took a while turning back after Sehwag sent him back.
Tendulkar nearly picks out cover this time. Low full toss outside off and he drives uppishly almost on the full to the fielder. Smart stuff from Kula.
corporal punishment from Sehwag, he's slapping everything. Shoddy delivery to start off, slow, short and sitting up nicely. Sehwag cross-bats it over the head mid-on.

that will only make D/L calculations tougher for India. Sehwag is gone, once again trying to heave a short ball over mid-on, but this time it loops off the top edge and lands in front of Dilshan, who tumbles forward and holds well. Sehwag will wonder if he should have gone squarer than that. The slowness of the pitch meant that was tougher.
back of a length outside off, Gambhir nudges it behind point for a single.
Sachin continues to flay them. Short of a length outside off, Tendulkar carves it up and over the covers with a lightning fast roll of the wrists.
the wrists again, this time he goes along the ground and forces the length ball away behind point for two more.
Tendulkar is on a mission here. He walks across the stumps, it is a slower ball, he adjusts superbly and opens the face to guide it to third man. And he absolutely scurries up and down for two.
full length outside Kula's off stump, and Gambhir hurtles down for a quick single after pushing to mid-off.
Sachin sets up early for the paddle from wide of off stump, short fine leg comes in the way and stops it.
superb from Gauti. Gets width outside off, he opens up the off side and steers expertly through the cover and point for his first four.
Gambhir walks out of the crease now, towards the off side, and whips a length ball off the pads over backward square leg for two.

India are going after 321 as if they need to do it in 30 overs. Gambhir has jabbed a length ball from Kula over the midwicket's head for four more. It wasn't full enough, and it was angling across, but Gambhir stayed back and swung resourcefully.
back of a length outside off stump, Gambhir chops it to backward point. Good over for India.
short of a length outside off stump, Tendulkar steers a single to third man.
slower ball from Maharoof, straightens down the line into Gambhir's pads and he nudges to leg.
another one back of a length, Gambhir pokes it through square leg for a single.
117 kph on a slower ball outside off stump. Sachin walked across the stumps and chipped it in the air over square leg. A teeny top edge on that, but it was safe.
short of a length to Gambhir, who hops and looks to deflect to the off side, but point comes in the way.

Gambhir's played that shot all summer, and invariably found the man at first slip. This time there's no one to take the edge. Back of a length outside off, Gambhir flirts with an open face and nicks it away to third man for four.
119 kph, slower ball to the master, who spotted it the moment Malinga decided he was going to bowl it. He waits and waits and wallops it cleanly over wide mid-on for four.

Tendulkar is gone, and this might be his last innings in this country that loves him so much. 144 kph yorker from Malinga, and Sachin pays the price for playing a high-risk shot. He's walked right across the stumps for the flick and missed the straight one. Hits the boot in front of middle and off. Sachin wasn't looking at the umpire, he was lookiing at the ball as it hurtled towards square leg. But he knew the finger was going up.
misses the target this time, attempted yorker goes down the leg side.
low, swinging full toss that moves away past Gambhir's loose push. Outside edge goes to turf on the way to the keeper.

Gambhir's split the gap between keeper and slip. How, only he knows. Another devilish yorker that swing away late. Gambhir covered the toes and got a toe-edge onto the ground, and it flew past Sanga's dive.
another one, Gambhir is in stumps-save mode. He digs it away to the off side.
Kohli picks up four the moment Malinga misses the yorker by an inch. The bat comes down at the right moment, his backlift isn't high, and the timing is immense as the flick flies through midwicket.
back of a length on the pads, Gambhir tucks it square for a single. Couldn't get bat on it, but as they say, India will take them however they come.
short of a length outside off stump, Kohli leans across and deflects to the off side.
Kohli leans out and punches firmly to cover, where Mahela prowls and fields.
three successive dots. Kohli is taking his time. Leans out and defends to point.
slow legcutter, Kohli gets the pad across and works it to midwicket for one.

that's another shot Gambhir's played unsuccessfully all summer. Goes back to a short of length ball outside off and tries to work it to the leg side. Mostly he's been getting leading edges while attempting it, but this time it goes past the inner edge.
short of a length on the hips, Kohli whips it through square leg for a couple. India have the fastest 100 of this tournament.
needs to be a little careful when he gets the pad across to play to the leg side like that. He gets the bat down this time and works it solidly through midwicket.
another leading edge for Gambhir as he tries to work a full length ball from outside off through mid-on. The ball goes to cover.
short ball, there's protection at third man, but Gambhir chooses to upper cut. He controls it and keeps it down

Kohli flicks just over the head of Jayawardene at short midwicket. That's where he was caught in the last game, and he needs to tighten that aspect of his shot making. He gets a couple this time to the deep.
142 kph on a full length ball outside off, Kohli inner edges to the leg side as he gets into an awry position for the drive.
slower ball, gambhir waits for the offcutter to go across him and dabs behind point for one.
back of a length, no pace on offer for Kohli to use. He punches firmly past the bowler off the front foot for one.
short of a length on the stumps, and tucked through square leg for one more.
Mahela is in the way again. Back of a length outside off, Kohli whips it to midwicket and the captain tumbles to field.
short of a length outside off, Kohli defends to the off side.
Kohli can't time it, as Mathews again removes all pace on the ball. He skips out and mistimes the push down the ground, back to the bowler.
angled across Gambhir, who has a fiddle and misses.
closer to off stump, and Gambhir gets the single with a dab behind point.
back of a length outside off stump, and Kohli punches through the covers for a single.
Kohli screams across for a quick single as Gambhir nudges a length ball to point.
Kohli escapes, he edges a big cover drive up in the air and it takes off in the direction of third man. It landed in front of the fielder as he ran in.
another single for Gambhir who opens the face and guides behind point.
back of a length outside off, Gambhir continues to dab singles behind point.
slower ball, Kohli's timing is all awry as he jumps out and looks to drive through the off side. Inside edge runs away behind his legs for one.
Gambhir continues to try the steer behind point on the off side, and this time he misses the ball.
slower ball again at 107 kph, Gambhir runs it to Herath at third man and looks for the second. But they have to settle for one.
back of a length, Kohli works it straight to midwicket. India have lost a bit of momentum here.
Kohli gets the front pad across and works a full ball off the pads behind square for two.
yet again Gambhir tries to dab a 142 kph length ball outside off to third man, and misses. Full marks for persistence.
short ball on the hips, Gambhir plays the pull into the ground behind square leg and charges back for the second.
short of a length outside off stump, Gambhir gets it away past a diving point for a single.
full ball on Kohli's pads, he flicks in the air to deep midwicket. The ball lands just short of the fielder.
another single as Gambhir drops a length ball behind point for one.
and that boundary makes it look better. Kohli finally times one well through the covers. He reaches across and thrashes a length ball through the off side for four.
full ball outside off stump, Gambhir defends carefully to the off side.
slower ball outside off, Gambhir drills it uppishly to long-off for one.
Kohli charges out and drives, but picks out wide mid-off this time.
length ball on the pads, worked to the leg side for one more.
slow offcutter again, Gambhir plays his pet shot through backward point for one more.

four freebies. Good length ball goes through the batsman as Kohli skips out and tries a listless work to leg. The ball slips between him and the stumps and very fine past Sanga's dive to the leg side.
Gambhir chooses to drive one of these length balls outside off instead of dabbing it to third man. Single to deep cover. Kohli fell while turning, else this could have been two.
111 kph on a slow legspinner that stops and jumps away from Kohli. He saw it early, leaned out and dumped it up and over cover for four.
short of a length outside off, Kohli goes back and across to work it to midwicket.
back of a length outside off once again, Kohli plays it straight to cover.
short ball angling in at 141 kph, Kohli lifts it with the angle over midwicket for one.

Another mad moment of running involving Gambhir. But Kohli might have just made his ground. Full ball on the pads, Gambhir whips it through midwicket and they complete two easy runs. Gambhir then charges through for the third, and Kohli responds really late. The throw was to the bowler's end, and Kohli managed to fly across and dive in by the time it was relayed to Sanga. The relay throw was quite wide from Thisara. Not Gambhir's fault this, there was three there. Kohli should have responded earlier.
109 kph outside off, Gambhir mistimes the drive down to long-off for a single.

Kohli's tonked a six with outrageous aplomb. He sashays out of the crease, and tells Mathews what he thinks of the slow offcutter. He gets under it and inside-outs it all the way over wide long-off. Some shot that, and Sanga comes up to the stumps.
fuller length outside off stump, Kohli pushes into the covers.
back of a length outside off stump, Kohli whips it in front of square leg for one.
back of a length on Gambhir's hips and he turns it round the corner for two more.
fuller length, Gambhir defends back down the pitch.
back of a length on off stump, Kohli works it through midwicket for one.
full length, Gambhir eventually gets the single to the right of the bowler.
short ball to Kohli, he gets a thick inside edge as he pulls to midwicket.
length ball outside off, Kohli loves this length. He powers it into the covers with wrists and top hand for a couple more.
another short ball, Kohli walks out of the crease and wades into it with a big heave through midwicket. Two runs taken.
short and wide, Kohli's got Thisara worrying about his lines. He slaps this through the covers for a single.
tossed up outside off stump, Kohli drives through cover-point for two.
slips a full ball down the leg side and it is called.
tossed up, Kohli plays it back to the bowler.
tossed up, Kohli carves inside out through the covers for a single.
short of a length outside off, Gambhir cuts it through point for one.
full ball on the stumps, Kohli drives through mid-on for one.
Gambhir leans out and drives through point for one.
back of a length on the pads, Gambhir tucks it through square leg for one.
Kohli tries to work the ball from outside off to the leg side. Leading edge yet again, this time it goes safely through mid-off for one.
low full toss, Gambhir misses out. He drives it straight to midwicket.
full and straight at 126 kph, Gambhir drives through mid-off for a single.
over-pitched on the stumps, Kohli whips through square leg for one more.
short of a length, Gambhir stays back and chops it to third man for one.
tossed up outside off, Gambhir defends to the covers.
Gambhir chips lout and gets close to the flight, he drives past midwicket and gets to his 3rd 50 in the CB series. The first 2 came in a different era.
very full, Kohli drives down to long-on for one.
Gambhir jumps out, Herath sees him and holds it back. Gambhir defends to the leg side.
Gambhir skips down again, opens up the off side as he does and looks to loft over the covers. Tight second possible there, but Kohli sends Gambhir back.
top over from Herath, only four runs in these circumstances. Pitched up outside off, driven through extra cover for one.

low full toss on Kohli's pads, he flicks resourcefully through square leg, and charges back for a quick second. Well run, and that's his 3rd 50 of the CB Series, all against SL. India's best batsman on this tour of Australia.
low full toss again, Kohli drives firmly to long-on for one more.
full and tight on off stump, Gambhir drives it down the ground for one more.
slower ball, 101 kph and very full on the toes. Kohli misses the legcutter and it hits the pad and dribbles to the off side.

four to Kohli. Would you take the wide or take four when the bowler slips one a few yards down the leg side? Kohli decides to paddle it and manages to get it past Sanga as he moves quickly to his left.
another very full ball on the stumps, Kohli drives down the ground for one.
back of a length on Gambhir's pads, and he's worked it square for two more. These two can run well when they get the calling right.
Gambhir advances, and gets too close to the flight. He still manages to push a single down to long-off.
tossed up outside off, Kohli drives another single through long-off.
Gambhir skips out again to a wide ball outside off stump and chips it on the bounce to long-off.
Mahela in the covers yet again. Kohli drives inside out into the covers, and the captain stops it.
low full toss on off stump, driven to long off for one more.
full ball angled into the pads, Kohli whips a single through midwicket.

Kohli is just in. Pitched up nice and wide off stump, Gambhir drives through extra cover. The fielder sends in a brilliant throw back to Mathews, and Kohli's dive got him in. He grazed his elbow on the turf as he did and is in some strife now.
back of a length to Gambhir, chopped straight to point.
offcutter slips across Gambhir, who drives in the air just over the point fieldsman for one.
Kohli moves across the stumps and nudges with the angle through square leg for one more.
over-pitched wide of off stump, Gambhir leans and drives to deep cover for one.
tossed up on the pads, Gambhir nudges behind square but can't get the single.
Gambhir runs out of the crease and on-drives firmly to deep long-on for one.
nearly holes out. Kohli skims a full ball almost straight to deep midwicket. It was too full for him to get under, hence he didn't get enough elevation.
Gambhir jumps out and plays a full ball back to the bowler.
hmm, close to off stump. Nerver. Gambhir tries ti sweep from the line of off stump and misses. The ball doesn't spin and flies just past off stump.
Gambhir chips out again and works a single through deep midwicket. Top over from Herath.
several men in the covers, and Gambhir finds one of them with his guide off a slower ball.
fuller ball outside off, he muscles it past cover now for one. India have 200.

Gambhir is gone. It was a high risk second run, and Gambhir took on Chandimal, but what a throw from deep midwicket. Kohli works another slower ball off the pads, it loops off the edge, but safely away from the fielders. Gambhir came back for the second, and Chandimal's throw to Mathews on the bounce left the bowler having very little to do.
length ball to Kohli, who whips muscularly to deep midwicket. On the bounce to Chandimal who parries as he over-runs it, and India get two.
top stuff from Kohli, gets the pad across to another slower ball and nurdles it with a lap shot past short fine leg.
length ball at 129 kph on leg and middle, Kohli drives through wide mid-on for one.
length ball outside off stump, Kohli blasts it to long-off, timed too well for the second.

Raina plays his trademark stroke first up. The medieval heave over midwicket. How he didn't hole out, only he knows. Chandimal runs across from deep midwicket, but he didn't attack the ball properly and it landed in front of him.
low full toss now, Raina muscles it through square leg for one more. He's going for it. And if he fails, it falls on Dhoni's shoulders. Again.
pitched up well and wide of off stump, drives through extra cover for one more. Kohli is timing them brutally now.
well run. Yorker on leg stump, Raina jammed it through midwicket and the two youngsters set off like terriers to complete two.
over-pitched wide of off stump, Raina's thrashed cover drive finds the fielder.
Kohli says hello Malinga, we've been expecting you. 141 kph length ball in the slot, Kohli blasts it over midwicket.
full ball wide of off stump, Kohli steers to point for a single.
the yorker is coming out now. Raina stays back and drives, but can't beat the covers.

Raina now, Malinga is having an off day at the wrong time. The yorker misses in line now, and marginally in length too. Full and sliding down the leg side, Raina gets it on the half volley and lap flicks behind square leg for four.
full and wide now, Raina opens the face and jams it away to third man for a single.
a wide now, Malinga swerves this one well wide and down the leg side.
four more to Kohli. Sri Lanka are feeling the heat now. Malinga slips another yorker on the full down the leg side. Kohli gets something on it and it flies down to fine leg for four.
Kula over-pitches, Raina has thirsted for these lengths all series. He's getting them now, he shows the full face of the bat and thumps the drive between mid-off and the bowler for four.

strange shot. Raina stays back and looks to pull a length ball on middle and leg. He misses and tumbles after it hits the pad. An appeal for lbw is turned down. Tough one to give, it was pitching outside the leg.
Kula is boiling under pressure. Wide now, well outside off stump.
another yorker misses the mark and Kohli is waiting. The backlift is minimal and he comes down on it powerfully to thunder it through midwicket.
it took them two months, but India's batsmen have finally announced themselves in Australia. Another whip-drive past mid-on as Kula sends down a low full toss right up there in the slot.
the off side now,just for variety. Kohli moves away to the leg side, opens up the off side where the field is in and carves joyously over the covers for four more. SL are bleeding now.
gets the length closer to perfection now, full and on the stumps, Kohli can't get it past the bowler and hence no single. Four fours in that over. India favourites now?
high full toss well outside off, Raina slaps it through the covers for two more. India have 250.
smart ball, full and wide of off stump. Raina can't dig it away but can't get bat on it.
full-pitched again. Not a single bouncer to Raina so far. He'll be thinking the IPL has started early. He drives through mid-off for a single.
114 kph on a slower ball, Kohli mis-hits the on-drive and it dribbles to long-on. They think of two, but can't get it.
direct hit might have sent Raina home. Full ball outside off, Raina drives into the covers and sets off. The throw misses.

Kohli's going bonkers. He stands tall to a slow legcutter that was telegraphed early. Thisara visibly changed pace in his delivery stride and dragged it short outside off. Kohli waits and thunders it over the covers for four more.
pitched up wide of off stump, Raina crashes it into the covers, but the fielder comes in the way.
full ball wide of off stump, another single taken into the covers.

still no bouncer to Raina! Over-pitched outside leg, Raina is inside the line and whips chirply, almost all the way over deep square leg. This is worse bowling than India earlier in the day, with the fine leg inside the circle. Ok, may be I am stretching it.
full and wide of off stump, Raina digs it out behind point for one.
yorker, Kohli is seeing them early. Whips through midwicket for a single.
quiet over. Only eight runs came off it. Full and outside off, Raina can't dig it away.
Kohli is hitting every ball harder than the previous one. Full length ball outside off, Kohli blazes it through the covers and Mathews slides on the ropes to field.
another wide down the leg side. This is pressure!
full pitched, Kohli's drive goes straight to cover.
doesn't time the drive this time, and that allows him to get the single to Dilshan in the covers.
over-pitched wide of off stump, Raina opens the face and steers to third man. Herath slides, fumbles and retrieves. Enough time for two whippets to scurry through for three.
slower ball on the pads, dinked behind square for one.

and STILL no bouncer to Raina. They keep throwing cannon fodder at him, and he keeps bombarding the grass banks beyond square leg. Full and sliding down the leg side, Raina's timing when he gets it in the slot is quite incomparable. Perfect wristwork after a big follow through, and the ball has disappeared.

he smiles. He doesn't curse, he smiles. Kohli has played the innings of his life. Malinga goes full on middle and leg, Kohli flicks into the deep and hurries back for the second. And he soaks in the atmosphere. Take a bow, Kohli!

Gambhir won't mind this. It could end in the 38th over. Length, length, listless length ball on the pads, Kohli's wrists do the rest and send them into the night sky. They land in the grassbanks again.
take cover in the covers! Pitched up outside off stump, and Kohli smashes it between cover and mid-off. Malinga squints as he follows the path of the ball.

he's shredded Malinga. Absolute battering this now. This is almost the perfect yorker, it tails in and hurtles towards the toes. Kohli's bat comes down decisively, taking advantage of a missed inch of length. Four through fine leg.

If you are the Bellerive Oval, you are seeing the world's best death bowler being butchered. Kohli gets another low full toss on his toes and flicks it behind square leg for another four. Great batting, turning the pressure back on a nerveless bowler. A normally nervesless bowler.

gosh, I am tired just describing this over. Spare a thought for Malinga. Another low full toss on the toes, you know the rest. This is horrid bowling in the Powerplay, with fine leg in the circle. Kohli has 122 off 81 balls.
Raina jumps out to a length ball outside off and heaves Mathews over wide mid-off for two more.
Raina threads the covers now and gets three more.
full length ball to Kohli, who works it through midwicket for one.
full ball on Raina's pads, whipped through square leg for one.
length to Kohli, who drives through mid-off for one more. Mahela looks clueless, pouts the lower lip. SL have given up.
offcutter nips away from Raina, who drives it into the covers.
another near yorker, Malinga is just not getting the lengths today. Not conceding the four in itself is a mini-victory. Whipped with the angle to deep midwicket for one.
Raina can take guard on the front foot if he wants to. Everything is full. Pitched up and pu nched through the covers for one.
Kohli glorious! The front foot crouches forward, the bat face opens, the pose is held as the ball booms away over the covers. He swaggers down the pitch, smiles and thumps Raina's gloves.

and that is how you pull a bunch of rabbits out of Geoff Boycott's hat. Full ball outside off, Kohli gets the front foot across, and smokes the leather off that one. The ball has tracer bulleted its way to the long-off fence. Kohli didn't wait to see its entire path. He turns to his team-mates, pumps his fists and smiles. Raina trots across and the two embrace in happiness. What. A. Chase. Sri Lanka have been battered.
